PAPIER-MACHE PHOTO FRAMES.

Display happy memories and precious moments in this unique and attractive Papier-Mache Photo Frame. Covered by magnificent design. It brings to mind the beauty of Kashimir art, and is an attractive accent piece for your table top, or a wonderful gift. Showcasing the magic of his skill, an artisan of Paper Mache beautifully picks hints from nature and pours it down on a photo frame to elegantly hold your memories and add to your valuable collections.

Material:
    Paper-Mache.
Care:
    Wipe with a soft dry cloth.
Usage:
    Photo Frame.
Sizes:
    7’’X5’’, 8’’X6’’, 9’’X7’’, 11’’X9’’.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days.

PAPIER-MACHE CARD BOX.

PAPIER-MACHE CARD BOX.

Decorate Your Work Desk And Make Them Look Fantastic With This Papier-Mache Card Box. The holder has been handcrafted in the Valley of Kashmir where skilled craftsmen paint elegies in art over a base of mashed paper or wood and transform them into pieces of luxury decor and accessories through an elaborate art form known as Papier-Mache.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE BOAT.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE BOAT.

Eternalize the beautiful memory of the Shikara ride you had in Kashmir in the world famous Dal Lake with our beautiful Papier-Mache replica of the same. The base in this beautiful boat is wooden over which is done the decorative art of Papier-Mache these beautiful wooden boats are done in the splendid Naqashi of Papier-Mache that adds charm and the spirit of paradise to your home with its exquisite craftsmanship and the most extraordinarily intricate pattern.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

DECORATIVE PAPIER-MACHE HANGINGS.

Kashmir Paper-Mache is a handicraft involving the transformation of paper pulp into intricately decorated artefacts such as Papier-Mache boxes, bowls, elephant models, cups and numerous other handy objects. These colourful hanging items comes in the shape of an cate, elephants, camels, horses, birds etc they come together to form a beautiful set which sways across your home. These hangings uses a material of mashed and hardened waste paper. The items are crafted in a fun mix of colours and within the realms of Kashmiri Paper Mache. This is achieved by magical hands which later lends its charm to your living space.
